solution_line_template: Chandler and Lucy can eat {chandler_apples_per_week} + {lucy_apples_per_week} = <<{chandler_apples_per_week}+{lucy_apples_per_week}={total_apples_per_week}>>{total_apples_per_week} apples per week.
Therefore, they have to order {total_apples_per_week} x {weeks_per_month} = <<{total_apples_per_week}*{weeks_per_month}={apples_per_month}>>{apples_per_month} apples for a month.
